Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Ms. Anderson
Reviews.Content: Lg Vortex love the phone, works great and been enjoying the phone since I got it. Everything works good nice pictures, love the wifi. Just a great phone all the way round.

Reviews.Title: Totally Relative
Reviews.Author: Liz Biddle
Reviews.Content: Whether you like this phone or not is totally relative to what you've had experience using. If this was my first smartphone I would most likely be satisfied. But I had an HTC rhyme and this is a definite downgrade. The biggest issues I've experienced are 1. There is no indicator light to flash after you've missed a call or text. 2. In the email program on the dashboard there is the capability to view existing folders however no way to move messages from your inbox to folders. You can get around this by opening your email in an internet browser. 3. The autocorrect is really weird and not as intuitive as newer models. That being said, if you're looking for a temporary phone as a replacement until your upgrade renewal period comes as I was, it does the job and I'd rather use this than my rhyme with a cracked screen.

Reviews.Title: Small screen, Slow, But great replacement for the money
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Wichamando"
Reviews.Content: One of the kids broke my wife's Verizon phone. For the price, this was a great replacement.  Much SLOWER and smaller screen than her origional HTC Incredible 2.  BUT, if you have ever had to buy a phone while still under contract and tried to do it throught the carrier, you know it would have cost 3 times as much and often for a referbished one.  This was much cheaper and with less hassle than using insurance with their outragious deductable.  I was warned by Verizon that many phones you buy can not be added to a contract until after 6 months after being purched (to get you in prepaid minutes)  This was NOT the case with this phone.  Overall, it works fine, does all the pictures, facebook, maps, and internet expected of it.

Reviews.Title: Great for first time smart phone buyers
Reviews.Author: thejmjohnson
Reviews.Content: There is not alot to this phone, but for the basic or new smart phone user thats enough. The phone has a camera, simple user interface, google android market and web browsing. And of course has decent call quality. Being used on americas best network, Verizon, it is worthwhile to have. Hopefully, youll enjoy this as  much as me.

Reviews.Title: I like this item however,
Reviews.Author: graffd11 "I am me and NO ONE will change who ...
Reviews.Content: I like this phone but i noticed there was a little black spec when i used the camera and i tried cleaning the lense still didnt work then i realized it was inside the lense so i called the the number the phone came with and they said well were sorry but we cant do anything about it. I paid 114 bucks for this phone and cant use the camera unless i want a black  spec in every picture. also i paid for overnight shipping and i got it 4 days later. I give this phone a 4 star review but the company a -5.

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: Yana Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I like the touch screen and its nice long battery life.  However, it freezes up a lot and lots of error messages.

Reviews.Title: Useless phone
Reviews.Author: ace1955
Reviews.Content: Got this phone as replacement because it was cheap and I foolishly believed the good reviews. You have to be very careful when you text with this or your replies go to anyone but who they are intended. Even if you remove the notification at top of screen. It just isn't worth it to use for texting and it does freeze up frequently. Save your money and pay a little more for a better phone. Mine will be put out of its misery with a hammer as soon as I get something better.

Reviews.Title: Works perfect
Reviews.Author: jessbuck
Reviews.Content: When I dropped and broke my new vortex, I was afraid I would have to spend hundreds to get a new phone.  This phone has worked perfectly and was a great price.  It was shipped quickly and I am very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Bonnie "Bonnie"
Reviews.Content: I received this phone when expected.  It works like it is suppose to and I have had it for several months.  Still happy with it.

Reviews.Title: simple phone
Reviews.Author: Shanna N. Gillespie "SG"
Reviews.Content: I don't like this phone because it was very basic. Small screen display and small text. I would not recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: No memory!
Reviews.Author: Michael42
Reviews.Content: This phone had the least internal memory of all the cell phones I have used the color purple suits me being fabu!

Reviews.Title: BETTER THAN THE A855, IS FASTER AND DOESN'T FREEZE UP.
Reviews.Author: R. Slone
Reviews.Content: IT WOULD HAVE TO SPIT OUT $20 BILLS TO RATE IT A 5 STAR. IT'S FASTER THAN MY MOTOROLA A855 AND DOESN'T FREEZE UP THEREFORE I DON'T HAVE TO REBOOT IT CONSTANTLY. VERY LITTLE I DON'T LIKE. I CAN'T BLAME MY FAT THUMBS FOR HITTING SOMETHING WHICH ACTIVATES SOMETHING ELSE, THEY DON'T SELL THUMB GUARDS. FOR THE TIME I'VE HAD IT, I SURE HOPE IT STAYS IN THIS CONDITION FOR AT LEAST A COUPLE YEARS. WE'LL SEE.

Reviews.Title: Great Replacement (No Contract) Phone
Reviews.Author: Regina Robertson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because it was almost identical to one I have that is not funtioning properly due to normal wear and tear.I found the replacement to be extrodinarily user friendly as it would be a later model. Perfect for me! Droid is the way to go!

Reviews.Title: 2 Days Report
Reviews.Author: Ashleigh
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for 2 days and I like it so far. It isnt my iphone but I like the features that the phone has. A little upset you cannot download Ituns to get Nike Run Fit Apps :(....I am still filling the phone out. Will update when I have had it for awhile.

Reviews.Title: I have this!
Reviews.Author: Ang Emma
Reviews.Content: Me my mom and my dad have the same phone  my dad's Is black and mine  and my mom's are purple they work so well I love my cellphone!!!:)

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Karen S. Berger
Reviews.Content: I had a samsung gem that never worked so I got this phone and love it. Works great and doesn't forclose apps on me. I looked at this phone and went with the samsung but I learned my lesson

Reviews.Title: Great phone.
Reviews.Author: Manda Horner
Reviews.Content: although i have an iphone 4 now, this was a great phone! it was small but i loved it. I recommend it for young preteens.

Reviews.Title: I would not advise of buying this item
Reviews.Author: Terry L. Feik
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these one for my wife and one for me, called verizon to connect it and found out 1 of the 2 could not be activated due to it was either lost or stolen. I could not beleive that this seller would ship a lost or stolen item to a custmer

Reviews.Title: cell phone cuts off
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: The cell phone shuts down once or twice a day. The order came on time and was pleased with that.

Reviews.Title: Android Rolls
Reviews.Author: Sally Mae
Reviews.Content: I like this phone. I gave it this rated because for the most part is serves my purpose.  I dislike the fact that it does not have enough space for some apps that I would like to download but yes I would recommend this product to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: Hancock
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because for it's price, I couldn't seem to find much else that was better out there. However, after about 6 months I started getting error messages about the phone not having enough storage space. I had to delete app after app. Now, I'm pretty much down to no apps, and, I'll still get the error messages when one of the pre-installed apps I don't even use updates! Very annoying! Now I'm having to constantly clear application data ... most of my apps are on my SD card, but, it doesn't help as much as I was hoping.Also, this phone will choose random times to reboot itself ... and when shuts off, then, turns back on, it makes that start-up sound ... rather distracting, especially if it happens during a meeting!Anyway ... this phone isn't that great.

Reviews.Title: i love my new phone
Reviews.Author: liberty
Reviews.Content: looks brand new - easy to operate came quickly in the mail. I have had other smartphones so it was very easy to figure out how to use. No scratches and very little wear on the actual phone casing. very glad i bought it!

Reviews.Title: LG VS66O VOTEX
Reviews.Author: Leticia Bravo
Reviews.Content: I have owned this model phone for a few years. I accidently dropped it in water. So I bought another one as I was perfectly satisfied with my vortex before ruining it. I expect the new one to work as good as my old one. If not I will follow up this review.

Reviews.Title: just like new
Reviews.Author: crystal
Reviews.Content: i just like the one i got when i first signed  up for my cell contract. only better, it wasnt 200.00. thanks for great savings

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: This is a good solid phone.  It has great call quality and is very fast browsing the web and running applications.  The only reason it is not 5 stars is because there is no flash on the camera.  In good light the pictures are good.  The battery life is good, I can easily make it through a full day or more on a single charge with moderate to heavy use.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I've had several issues with non contract phones (I have to replace my droid as my cell plan isn't eligible for an upgrade yet) and I didn't have a lot of hope in finding something under $200. This phone is small, light weight and has great screen quality. It was easy to activate, configure, and nothing hangs or force closes. One thing to note...the screen is smaller than most smart phones. A lot of landscape is occupied with numerous buttons and frames but they don't detract from the general usefulness. Overall, this is a quality, affordable phone. Recommend!

Reviews.Title: Data Plan?
Reviews.Author: Kelsey McKay
Reviews.Content: This phone looks awesome but am I required to have the extra $30 data plan with this phone? Or can i just do the $10 internet?

Reviews.Title: NEED TO BE PUT IN THE TRASH
Reviews.Author: Greg Rivers
Reviews.Content: Work when it want too.....need to send back can't answer calls most of the time when texting it spells what it want

Reviews.Title: Good starter smartphone.
Reviews.Author: Chris Boykin
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for your first smart phone the Vortex is a great start. It is a very small phone but it's sturdy. The included mini sd card is very small but you can change that, which is almost a necessity. There are a lot of pre included apps that take up a lot of the space already, so you won't have a lot of space to work with anyway. But with a good power saving app (like Juice Defender) you can make the battery last a fair amount longer, and as long as you don't keep a bunch of apps running at once it will keep up.

Reviews.Title: great starter phone.
Reviews.Author: M. Harmon "C.P.A."
Reviews.Content: I got this phone very quickly. It said it was used but it still had all the plastic on the screen and on the battery.I own 2 and both my kids like the phone.proscheapresponsive touch screenconsold android versionneed to root to add a lot of apps.

Reviews.Title: Just as I expected
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: The phone came just in time but I'm still figuring how to activate it when it ready to be use.overall I had to say this is my first android phone Haha, but I'm happy it arrive :).

Reviews.Title: Bad phone
Reviews.Author: Peanut
Reviews.Content: Too many problems. For one, not enough storage even with my sd card. Not a good battery either. Also has random spasms and just freezes. Everyone I know that has this phone hates it! Do not get it!

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Larissa Woodard
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift and it was order in Purple which I did not get! It came black which meant I had to find a case for the phone so, do I like the phone yes but, was very unhappy that it was not the color that was order for me!

Reviews.Title: LG VORTEX
Reviews.Author: Crystal DuBose
Reviews.Content: Received timely as promised.  No issues with product or transaction.  My son likes it, but is already hinting for an iPhone.  Fourteen and going on 25 I think!!  He is a great kid and deserves the phone.  Thanks for the great customer service and timely answer to my emails.

ProductInfo.Features:
Easy-to-use Android 2.2-powered 3G smartphone with touchscreen display and virtual onscreen keyboard (including Swype enhancement)
Access to Google services; Bing Search and Maps enabled; can be used as a 3G Mobile Hotspot for up to five Wi-Fi connected devices; VZ Navigator capable
Wi-Fi networking; 3.2-MP camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD memory expansion; HTML web browser
Up to 7.5 hours of talk time, up to 500 hours (20+ days) of standby time; released in December, 2010
Clear ESN , Ready To Activate, No Contract Required. Includes: Phone, Battery, Wall Charger. ***Verizon Data Plan Required***
ProductInfo.Name: Verizon LG Vortex Android Smartphone Plum No Contract
